description.en: Lee Yuri studied as the successor of the aroma shop, her family’s business has been passed down from generation to generation. She rejected the love of her smug classmate, but end up being bullied by the boy’s gang at school. One day, she was running away from the man who was bothering her and went to the mountain. But suddenly a tin fell from the sky and hit Yuri’s head which killed her immediately. Yuri thought she was dead, but when she opened her eyes, she was already on the lap of a handsome man named Sowoo! And the man called her Lady.
